channel.title: How do I change the server name!?!?
channel.description: Ok, I run my server so my friends or others can join, and on no-ip my server name is ninjascape.no-ip.org, but that doesn't work. In order to get to my server, I have to type in 127.0.0.1 in the server! How do I change this so my friends type in ninjascape instead of numbers when the go to "new server" on MoparScape?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 18, 2007, 02:51:12 PM[/size][hr]Gosh, this place is DEAD! NO ONE FRICKING REPLIES!

item.title: How do I change the server name!?!?
item.dc:creator: @MMcgrady1 MMcgrady1
item.description:
@MMcgrady1 wrote:

Make sure you have a router. You need to portforward it first.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change the server name!?!?
